transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Hello.

Customer: Haan ji. Hello.

Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. Haan ji sir ji good afternoon.

Customer: Good afternoon. Sir Raman bol raha tha, namaste.

Executive: Haan, haan.

Customer: Woh customer care se na sir call kar rahe the. Bataye na.

Executive: Haan, haan. Accha kya dikkat aa gayi sir?

Customer: Woh dikkat nahi woh lag gaya tha mere se main kuch option check kar raha tha.

Executive: Haan, haan. Woh lag gaya tha. Haan, abhi.

Executive: Accha woh by mistake.

Executive: Hmm. Accha yeh by mistake lag gaya tha kya?

Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ji, ji.

Executive: Haan.

Executive: Okay. Baki us din ji maine baat chit kara tha aapse.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Baki lead vagera kaise aa rahi hai isko consume kar rahe hai us pe? Jaise sir sudhar hua hai lead ab apne matlab ki aani shuru hui hai pehle toh apne matlab ki nahi aa rahi thi.

Customer: Hmm, hmm.

Customer: Haan, toh thoda sa yeh dekhna sir Uttarakhand, Bareli, Rampur, Muradabad wali prime location karwa do hamari jaise priority pe agar yeh aaye toh.

Executive: Dekhiye location depend karta hai woh aapke upar maine aapko location bata diya hai na. Aapko jis location ka lead chahiye na woh location upar city mein select karke kyuki udhar ka lead available hoga toh aapke paas show karega us pe aap consume karke baat kar sakte hai us se.

Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.

Executive: Toh jis tarah city mein upar dikha raha tha na city search karne ka bhi option aata hai waha pe. Toh aap search bhi kar sakte hai.

Executive: Abhi hum ek cheez dekh rahe the jaise Jindal stainless steel pipe hai na Jindal ka. Uska lead consume kar rahe hai abhi aap.

Customer: Hmm, hmm.

Executive: Samjhe? Toh iska bhi hai isko rakhna hai isko profile pe?

Customer: Haan rakhna hai.

Executive: Chalo isko hum add kar dete hai mapping vagera kar dete hai isko hum. Haan.

Executive: Theek hai ek aur product hai stainless steel scrap. Jo aap sab install hai woh?

Customer: Nahi sir scrap se related apni dealing nahi hai koi bhi.

Executive: Scrap toh nahi hai na?

Customer: Na.

Executive: Toh usko rehne dete hai jaise hai waise hi rehne dete hai usko. Hmm.

Executive: Baki aur baki aur koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir service mein?

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Aur koi dikkat toh abhi koi dikkat nahi hai hogi toh sir main call karunga aapka number maine save kar rakha hai woh.

Executive: Haan mera number hai aapne customer care pe call kiya tha na toh isliye isme office wala number se call lag raha hai aapko. Mera jo number hai sir call karte hai aap wahi pe call kar liya kijiyega.

Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants prime locations: Uttarakhand, Bareli, Rampur, Muradabad.

- Enquired about Jindal stainless steel pipe lead.

- Asked about stainless steel scrap.



Resolution:

- Explained how to select specific locations.

- Confirmed Jindal stainless steel pipe lead to be added.

- Confirmed customer does not deal with steel scrap.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- location, leads, stainless steel, scrap
